import React from "react"; import { Button } from "../../../../components/ui/button"; import { Card, CardContent } from "../../../../components/ui/card"; import { Input } from "../../../../components/ui/input"; import { Textarea } from "../../../../components/ui/textarea"; export const ContactSection = () => { const inputStyles = "w-full px-6 py-4 bg-[#0A0A0A] text-white text-base rounded-[14px] border-[1px] border-solid border-[#bfff0040] font-['Montserrat',Helvetica] font-normal placeholder:text-gray-500 focus:border-[#bfff00] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#bfff00] transition-all duration-300 hover:border-[#bfff0080] shadow-sm shadow-[#bfff0020]"; return (
{/* Form Section */}
